sub_title: Senior Web Developer, SEO Technical and Researcher
summary:
Passionate, knowledgeable multifaceted senior web developer and SEO expert who has a deep practical experience (exceeded 20 years) in all website aspects from initial idea, design, technical structure building, execution, testing, publishing, hosting, maintenance, upgrading, troubleshooting to highly optimization processes for performance and web presence growth using different Audits, Analytics, Web and SEO techniques, considering the user experience through all the process.
Designed and published tens of websites in business sector for different fields as well as education sector (e.g universities, colleges, health& medical, trading, manufacturing, ..etc)

Have M.Sc. degree in Information Systems. My research interests include Ontologies, Knowledge Management, Semantic Web, MIS, Business Intelligence and Bioinformatics.

I prefer to work for international firms with multicultural environment and dynamic organizations where I can grow and develop my career.

Currently searching for new challenge on web development (UI, Front-End Development are preferred), Web development, eCommerce development, Web Performance development, SEO management, Research.

projects.title: Mansoura University Website
projects.description:
I've fully worked on building Mansoura University main website from Scratch (since Jan 2002 till Sept 2020 ). The website is Dynamic, Bilingual, and has Content Administration Back-end.
I've Continued Maintenance, Upgrading the website till June 2020.

The project involved migrating all archived data since 2001 on the older website to the new one.
